p: The properties of the materials including the oil sample, brine, polymer, and core samples are outlined in Table 1, Table 2, Table 3 and Table 4, respectively. Here, the single carbon number and the viscosity measurement of the oil sample were performed on an Agilent 7890A gas chromatograph from Agilent Technologies (Santa Clara, CA, USA) and the Physica MCR301 advanced rotary rheometer from Anton Paar (North Ryde, NSW, Australia).
